title: Real Madrid Draw Manchester City in Champions League's Round of 16 - Managing Madrid
description: Real Madrid and Manchester City meet in the UEFA Champions League’s Round of 16, setting up a thrilling matchup for fans across Europe.
content:
1. Real Madrid draw Manchester City in Champions League’s Round of 16  Managing Madrid
  2. UEFA Champions League round of 16, quarter-final and semi-final draw  UEFA.com
  3. Chelsea to face holders PSG in Champions League last 16  BBC
  4. Champions League round of 16 predictions: Real Madrid over Man City  espn.in
  5. Champions League last 16: tie-by-tie analysis and predictions | Jonathan Wilson  The Guardian

Real Madrid and Manchester City met in the UEFA Champions League's Round of 16, bringing excitement to fans across Europe. The match is set to be a thrilling showdown as both teams aim to secure their place in the next phase of the competition.

In the tournament’s quarter-final stage, Real Madrid faced off against Ajax, with the Spanish giants advancing through the knockout rounds. Meanwhile, Manchester City came into the contest after defeating Borussia Dortmund 3-2 in the previous round. The draw saw both teams face each other in this crucial match-up for European football's elite.

The UEFA Champions League is one of the world’s most prestigious clubs’ tournaments, with Real Madrid and Manchester City taking on some of Europe’s biggest names. With fans eagerly anticipating the clash between two of Europe’s best teams, it promises to be a memorable encounter that will surely go down in history.

Real Madrid and Manchester City have proven their worth over the years, consistently competing at the highest level of European football. The upcoming matchup is expected to see both sides push for victory, with fans eagerly anticipating which team will claim their first ever Champions League win against the other.
